Building Stat.Slider: How many Sweet treats or Cookies Ki Spheres have been obtained?

40004136.Brief effect description: Heals +2% per Sweet treats and Cookies Ki Spheres obtained{currentValue} / 46
40004136.Line description: Heals +2% per Sweet treats and Cookies Ki Spheres obtained{currentValue} / 46

Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Recovers 5% HP
- Recovers HP with sweet treats
*Per "Majin Power" Category ally on the team*
- Ki +1
- ATK & DEF 40%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading
enemy's attack 10%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When all allies are "Majin Power" Category characters*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
- Performs a critical hit
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 60%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When HP is 40% or more*
- Survives K.O. attacks (up to once within a turn)
*When HP is 80% or less*
- Recovers 5% HP
*When HP is 40% or less*
- Recovers 10% HP
*If HP is 60% or more when attacking*
- ATK 60%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When receiving a Ki Blast Super Attack*
- High chance of nullifying it and countering with tremendous
power

5535.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK for 4 turns and 
causes supreme damage to enemy
